类 ActiveActorDestructible

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.model.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.model.ActiveActorDestructible
所有已实现的接口:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
直接已知子类:
FighterPlane, Projectile
public abstract class ActiveActorDestructible extends ActiveActor implements Destructible
Represents an active, destructible actor in the game.

This class extends ActiveActor and implements Destructible, adding the ability for objects to be destroyed. It provides a framework for actors that can be damaged and removed from the game.

Subclasses must implement the movement logic (`updatePosition`), status update logic (`updateActor`), and the behavior for taking damage (`takeDamage`).

Key features:

  • Tracks destruction state of the actor using isDestroyed.
  • Provides a default implementation for the `destroy` method from Destructible.
  • Encourages subclasses to define their own movement and update logic.

作者:
[Xia si zhe]

  • 构造器详细资料

    • ActiveActorDestructible

      public ActiveActorDestructible(String imageName, int imageHeight, double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Constructs an ActiveActorDestructible with the specified attributes.
      参数:
      imageName - The name of the image representing the actor
      imageHeight - The height of the actor's image
      initialXPos - The initial X position of the actor
      initialYPos - The initial Y position of the actor

  • 方法详细资料

    • updatePosition

      public abstract void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the actor.

      Subclasses must implement this method to define how the actor moves.

      指定者:
      updatePosition 在类中 ActiveActor

    • updateActor

      public abstract void updateActor()
      Updates the actor's status.

      Subclasses must implement this method to define custom update logic, such as checking interactions or updating visuals.

    • takeDamage

      public abstract void takeDamage()
      Handles the logic for the actor taking damage.

      Subclasses must implement this method to define how damage affects the actor.

      指定者:
      takeDamage 在接口中 Destructible

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Marks the actor as destroyed.

      This method is called when the actor is removed from the game or when its health or other criteria reach a critical state.

      指定者:
      destroy 在接口中 Destructible

    • setDestroyed

      protected void setDestroyed(boolean isDestroyed)
      Checks if the actor is destroyed.

      public boolean isDestroyed()
